title: Bug Splat
body: i keep on getting bug splats when trying to load into games this is super annoying especially when you're playing ranked and get reported for "AFK" but you cant help it how is this right i cant help the game crashing why am i getting punished with 20 minute que times :/ please fix this soon not the first time this has happened to me

replies.body:
Bugsplats are often the result of driver or hardware issues. We've consolidated the most frequent fixes for them in our [Bugsplat & Crash guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes), so I strongly recommend starting there.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
